title: Before My Eyes
description: In Caroline Bock's powerful new young adult novel Before My Eyes ,someone is falling in love...someone is popping pills...and someone is hearing voices and has a gun. But no one wants to see what is happening right before their eyes. Set at the end of a seemingly endless summer in Long Island, New York and narrated in turns by Claire, Max, and Barkley, Before My Eyes captures a moment when possibilities should be opening up, but instead everything teeters on the brink of destruction.
author: Caroline Bock
